revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=EnGenius |model=ECB600 |revision=(v1.5) |upc=655216005846 |asin=B00CWIKET0 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Senao |fcc_date=05/28/2013 |fcc_id=A8J-ECB600 |ic_id=10103A-ECB600 |pcb_id=7016A060700g |type=access point, bridge |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |pwr_poe=at/af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9344 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16DG-AC |ram1_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, populated,, H5 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, H1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9344 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9382;AR9382-AL1A; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035-A |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2576L;;2;,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE5003L1;;2;,,, 802.3at PoE Interface and DC/DC Controller;TI;TPS23754;;1;,,, 150V N-Channel MOSFET;Vishay Siliconix;Si4848DY;;3;,,, 1-Channel Photocoupler;LiteOn;LTV-817;;1; |flags=SNMP, PoE, |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31;OpenWrt Kamikaze; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid_regex=^EnGenius[A-F0-9]{6}-2.4G$, ^EnGenius[A-F0-9]{6}-5G$, |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=88:DC:96 |oui_eth=88:DC:96 }} {{TagLine|Dual-Band Long Range Wireless N Indoor Access Point/Client Bridge}} :[http://www.engeniustech.com/business-networking/indoor-access-points-client-bridges/16757-ecb600-coming-soon Product page] {{â€¢}} [http://www.engeniustech.com/resources/ECB600_DS_051313.pdf Datasheet]
"ECB600-0.40 LFP" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The 5GHz radio (AR9344) is using two ''[[Skyworks]]'' (''SiGe'') [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=969 SE5003L] 5GHz Power Amplifier ICs.
Default credentials are per the FCC manual. :The default SSID patterns appear to be '''EnGeniusXXXXXX-2.4G''' and '''EnGeniusXXXXXX-5G'''.
==Images== <gallery> File:EnGenius ECB600 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:EnGenius ECB600 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
